com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.tree
Class Tree

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.Component
              com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.BoxComponent
                  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.tree.Tree
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
TreeTable
public class Tree
extends BoxComponent

A standard hierarchical tree widget. The tree contains a hierarchy of TreeItems that the user can open, close, and select.

Events:
BeforeAdd : TreeEvent(item, child, index)
Fires before a item is added or inserted. Listeners can set the doit field to false to cancel the action.
  • item : this
  • child : the item being added
  • index : the index at which the item will be added
BeforeRemove : TreeEvent(item, child)
Fires before a item is removed. Listeners can set the doit field to false to cancel the action.
  • item : this
  • child : the item being removed
BeforeExpand : TreeEvent(item)
Fires before a item is expanded. Listeners can set the doit field to false to cancel the expand.
  • item : this
BeforeCollapse : TreeEvent(item)
Fires before a item is collapsed. Listeners can set the doit field to false to cancel the collapse.
  • item : this
Add : TreeEvent(item, child, index)
Fires after a item has been added or inserted.
  • item : this
  • child : the item that was added
  • index : the index at which the item will be added
Remove : TreeEvent(item, child)
Fires after a item has been removed.
  • item : this
  • child : the item being removed
Expand : TreeEvent(item)
Fires after a item has been expanded.
  • item : this
Collapse : TreeEvent(item)
Fires ater a item is collapsed.
  • item : this
CheckChange : TreeEvent(item)
Fires after a check state change.
  • item : this
ContextMenu : ComponentEvent(component)
Fires before the tree's context menu is shown.
  • component : this
MouseOver : TreeEvent(item, event)
Fires when the mouse is over an item.
  • item : active item
  • event : dom event
MouseOut : TreeEvent(item, event)
Fires when the mouse leaves an item.
  • item : active item
  • event : dom event
MouseDown : TreeEvent(item, event)
Fires when the mouse is pressed.
  • item : active item
  • event : dom event
KeyDown : TreeEvent(item, event)
Fires when the key is pressed.
  • item : the active item
  • event : dom event
CSS:
.my-tree (the tree itself)
.my-tree-item-text span (the tree item text)

Field Detail

selectionMode

public Style.SelectionMode selectionMode
Sets the tree selection mode (defaults to SINGLE). Valid values are SINGLE and MULTI.

animate

public boolean animate
True to animate tree item expand and collapse (defaults to true).

checkable

public boolean checkable
True for a check box tree (defaults to false).

itemImageStyle

public java.lang.String itemImageStyle
The global icon style for leaf tree items (defaults to null). Individual tree items can override this value by setting the the item's icon style.

nodeImageStyle

public java.lang.String nodeImageStyle
The global icon style for tree items with children (defaults to 'tree-folder'). Individual tree items can override this value by setting the the item's icon style.

openNodeImageStyle

public java.lang.String openNodeImageStyle
The global icon style for expanded tree items (defaults to 'tree-folder-open'). Individual tree items can override this value by setting the the item's icon style.

checkNodes

public Tree.CheckNodes checkNodes
Sets which tree items will display a check box (defaults to BOTH).

Valid values are:

  • BOTH - both nodes and leafs
  • PARENT - only nodes with children
  • LEAF - only leafs

checkStyle

public Tree.CheckCascade checkStyle
Sets the cascading behavior for check tree (defaults to PARENTS).

Valid values are:

  • NONE - no cascading
  • PARENTS - cascade to parents
  • CHILDREN - cascade to children

Tree

public Tree()
Creates a new single select tree.

expandPath

public boolean expandPath(java.lang.String path)
Expands a specified path. A path can be retrieved from a tree item with TreeItem.getPath().

Parameters:
path - the path to expand
Returns:
true if all paths expanded

the matching tree item or null if no match

onComponentEvent

public void onComponentEvent(ComponentEvent ce)
Description copied from class: Component
Any events a component receives will be forwarded to this method. Subclasses should override as needed. The Component.onBrowserEvent(com.google.gwt.user.client.Event) method should not be overridden or modified.

Overrides:
onComponentEvent in class Component
Parameters:
ce - the base event

Description copied from class: Component
Components delegate event handling to Component.onComponentEvent(ComponentEvent). Sublcasses should not override.

Specified by:
onBrowserEvent in interface com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
Overrides:
onBrowserEvent in class Component

setContextMenu

public void setContextMenu(Menu menu)
Description copied from class: Component
Sets the component's context menu.

Parameters:

setIndentWidth

public void setIndentWidth(int indentWidth)
Sets the number of pixels child items are indented. Default value is 18.

Parameters:
indentWidth - the indent width

setSelection

public void setSelection(java.util.List selected)
Sets the selection to the tree items. The current selection is cleared before the new items are selected. If the tree is single-select then all items are ignored.

Parameters:
selected - the items to select

setSelection

public void setSelection(TreeItem item)
Sets the selection to the item. The current selection is cleared before the new items are selected.

Parameters:
item - the item to select

setSelectionMode

public void setSelectionMode(Style.SelectionMode selectionMode)
Sets the selection mode for the list. Calling after the tree has been rendered will have no effect.

Parameters:
selectionMode - the selection mode
